reuo.resources

Class Speech

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuo.resources.Speech

  • public class Speech
extends java.lang.Object
    A word that contains translations or variants. The word may be referenced by it's unique identifier. In the network protocol this is used to reduce the transmission of common words as they can be referenced by their identifiers. This also provides for rudementrary translations. Not all words have the same amount of translations or variants.

    Unknown

    The layout of the translations currently not known. All speech data is stored as UTF-8 characters, however the order these translations are stored seems relavent but is unknown.
    Author:
    Kristopher Ives, Lucas Green
